definition: Sendai, city in northeast Japan
immortal
(classical) you (in letters)/variant of 臺|台[tai2]
Taiwan (abbr.)/surname Tai
memorial altar/platform for praying to immortals

sentences.english: The train puffed towards Tokyo from Sendai.
Sendai is a microcosm of what ails Japan.
sentences.chinese: 仙台市的現狀，就是整個日本的縮影。

sentences.english: The battery plant outside Sendai is able to produce 200,000 batteries a year.
sentences.chinese: 位於仙台附近的電池廠每年可產電池20萬套。

sentences.english: Residents of Sendai line up at a water dispensation center set up at a school yard. By Kyodo/Reuters.
sentences.chinese: 學校操場上的臨時供水點前排隊的仙台居民。

sentences.english: The history of the Sendai region seemed to support that idea.
sentences.chinese: 仙台地區的歷史似乎能夠證明這個說法的正確性。

sentences.english: MODIS detected a fire burning near the shore north of Sendai.
sentences.chinese: MODIS探測到仙台市北部海岸的一處着火地點。

sentences.english: Houses swept by a tsunami smoulder near Sendai Airport …
sentences.chinese: 仙台機場附近的房屋被海嘯摧毀，一片狼藉。

sentences.english: The desire for government handouts is a constant theme in Sendai.
sentences.chinese: 渴望政府提供撥款在仙台是個不斷被談論的話題。

sentences.english: In the city of Sendai the police found up to 300 bodies in a single ward.
sentences.chinese: 在仙台市警方發現多達300個機構在一個病房。

sentences.english: It was centered under the sea about one hundred thirty kilometers east of Sendai.
sentences.chinese: 這是中心根據有關一百三十零公里仙台東海。

sentences.english: Conclusion:The marmosets were died of the infection of sendai virus.
sentences.chinese: 結論狨猴的死亡原因是仙台病毒感染所致。

sentences.english: But it was in Sendai and adjacent coastal areas that the impact was strongest.
sentences.chinese: 但受地震影響最大的，還是仙台市和附近的沿海地區。

sentences.english: In the city of Sendai, the police found up to 300 bodies in a single ward.
sentences.chinese: 在仙台市，警方僅在一條街道就發現了300具屍體。

sentences.english: A 5 minutes walk from the west exit of Sendai Station.
sentences.chinese: 仙台朝市離我們酒店很近，走幾分鐘的路程就能到了。

sentences.english: Sendai City and Salt Kettle, a city at the junction of petrochemical Factory fire.
sentences.chinese: 仙台市和鹽釜市交界處的一家石油化工廠發生火災。

sentences.english: The last giant tsunami recorded in Sendai struck in 869.
sentences.chinese: 仙台地區上一次有記錄的巨大海嘯發生在869年。

definition: Kangshan town in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan/Okayama prefecture in southwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]

Shiga prefecture in central Japan
Edo (old name of Tokyo)
Yamamoto (Japanese surname)
Mi'e prefecture in central Japan
Heian Jingū or Heian Shrine, in Kyōto, Japan
Yingzhou, easternmost of three fabled islands in Eastern sea, home of immortals and source of elixir of immortality
Matsushima (name)/Matsushima town and national park in Miyagi prefecture, Japan
peach mountain/Taoshan district of Qitaihe city 七台河[Qi1 tai2 he2], Heilongjiang
Lanshan district of Rizhao city 日照市[Ri4 zhao4 shi4], Shandong
